name: Farlight (Lost Rabbit Digital)
description:
This is a quick game I made in about an hour. I might explore this project more but for now this is just a demo. There isn't a goal, you simply walk around and explore.

Features:

- Procedural world

- Procedural main menu (Same as world)

- Simple movement system

- Viewbobbing

- Music

- Stamina
